text: IDEA: create a product update / announcement channel in this slack
they kinda use the <#C22PU4LV8|general> channel for it.
I'd be up for a Beta's channel where we can see all the betas that are in progresss

that or having a betas page that lists them all with a basic description and a status of “hey this is open beta, request an invite” “This is a closed alpha- we’re not sure this will ever see the light of day but are trying it” “This is a closed beta,  There are a hella lotta known bugs, Request an invite, knowing there could be issues.” “Then maybe codenames for betas/alphas  listed for ones that are in testing that some users have access to they don’t want public, and just have a note “testers in this beta have signed an NDA What happens in this beta stays in this beta”
<@U3T21PDBK> Their is an RSS add on for slack where we could subscribe to this <https://www.HubSpot.com/product-updates/rss.xml>
true… but sometimes things get a little lost in general with hundreds of people in the slack channel
Sorry I’m one of those loudmouths that causes things to get burried lol
Can we have the file name of the current image displayed?
